snippet.title: Agent USA Adv. Game longplay w/ cheats (Apple II - Scholastic)
snippet.description:
Agent USA (https://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/agent-usa) was an educational action game published by Scholastic software in 1984 for the Apple ][. Your goal is to stop the Fuzzbomb by getting to its location quickly with 100 crystals while growing crystals and avoiding fuzzed people in the process. The advanced game started with more than half of the country infected with fuzzed people already. Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

PS: The # of crystals is stored at address $000E and you can stop people from stealing your crystals by changing $104B from C6 to A5. You can also stop losing your crystals when bumping into fuzzed people by changing $C2B from 85 to A5.

Credits:
Cover art - www.mobygames.com
Disk image - 4AM
